Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.elements.builder

Class AuditablePrincipalPropertyViewElementBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.elements.builder.AuditablePrincipalPropertyViewElementBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder
public class AuditablePrincipalPropertyViewElementBuilder extends Object implements com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder

Custom ViewElementBuilder for createdBy and lastModifiedBy properties of any Auditable entity. Will lookup the label for an assumed principal name using the.

Usually set for ViewElementMode.LIST_VALUE and ViewElementMode.VALUE.

Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme
